title: Interview: Acer talks redefining gaming with 3D, sustainability, and more
content:
Acer just held its next@acer conference, which is its hero event where the company announces new products from its entire range. That includes Swift, Spin, ConceptD, Predator, Vero, and more. As usual, there was a lot of cool stuff. Interestingly, about half of the 45-minute event was focused on Vero, Acer’s portfolio of eco-friendly products.

The post Interview: Acer talks redefining gaming with 3D, sustainability, and more appeared first on XDA.
description: Following next@acer, we got to sit down with some Acer execs in order to talk about naked-eye 3D gaming, eco-friendly PCs, and more.
